instruction: Edit the email for style and clarity
input:
Dear Amy,

I hope you are doing well. I wanted to tell you about something exciting that happened last week. At the solar energy conference, New Horizon Manufactoring wants to meet with us to discuss the photovoltaic window system we’ll soon be launching.

It would be great to meet this Tuesday.

Sincerely,
Allison
output:
Dear Amy,

I hope you are doing well. I'm excited to share that New Horizon Manufacturing has expressed an interest in meeting with us to discuss our upcoming photovoltaic window system. It would be great to schedule the meeting for this Tuesday, if possible.

Best,
Allison
